name: Emissions of Air Pollutants
businessDefinition: Tonnes of emissions by air pollutants. Emissions by air pollutants include direct sulphur oxides (Sox/SO2) emissions, direct nitrogen oxides (NOx/NO2) emissions, direct ammonia (NH3) emissions, direct particulate matter (PM2.5) emissions, direct non-methane volatile organic compounds (NMVOC) emissions and direct total heavy metals (HM) emissions (encompassing cadmium, mercury and lead). See Regulation (EU) 2022/1288, Annex I, top (28) and table 2, indicator nr. 2 and Directive (EU) 2016/2284, Article 3, points (5)-(8) and Annex I, table A.
